item.title: ‘Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse’ Delays 2027 Theatrical Release By 3 Weeks
item.description: Spider-Man fans will have to wait just a little bit longer to go “Beyond the Spider-Verse.” The third film in Sony’s popular web-slinging animated series has shifted its release date

item.title: ‘Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse’ Moves to End of June 2027
item.description: The third chapter in the trilogy will arrive four years after ‘Across the Spider-Verse’ became a hit.
